website_summaries.verdict: Trendy thong sandals that are ideal for summer, but the design isn't for everyone.
pros: A minimalist sandal that's constructed like a flip flop
A good choice for hot days and for those who prefer limited foot coverage
cons: The toe separator piece may be uncomfortable to some
Though unisex, this style won't appeal to all men

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plantar Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I buy them over and over, year after year. I have owned at least 10 pairs. They are a life saver for my Plantar Fasciitis. They have a strong arch support. The shoes are well made, I wear them almost every day. If your foot is even slightly narrow, make sure you order in a narrow width, the regular width will be too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Issabelle

customer_reviews.title: Better luck buying from authorized Birk seller
customer_reviews.text: At first o questioned the authenticity of these, so I went to Dillard’s and purchased same shoes, but for $20 more. I took photos. On the gizeh from Amazon the t-strap wouldn’t lay flat. I have two other pairs of Gizehs and this isn’t a problem with them. It also isn’t an issue with the pair I purchased at Dillard’s. In the photos, the Dillard’s pair is on the left. The two footbeds are also different. The straps, however, are made of identical faux leather. The strap on the amazon pair just appears to be longer. Anyway, I’m sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: PhunkyPhotog

customer_reviews.title: make sure that they are good and snug
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I'd own a pair of these. No offense everyone...but not exactly fashion forward. However, after wearing them...I could care less. I have a low (not flat) arch and after 20 years of professional dance my knees had begun to ache. The arch support in these literally got rid knee pain. After about one week of wearing them, the soles also became a bit more flexible. There isn't any way to adjust the top strap. So when you purchase, make sure that they are good and snug..because they will relax a bit. I generally wear a size 6 but went down because they were a bit long. Now if only I could wear these in the Minnesota winters....
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed. L.O.V.E
customer_reviews.text: I adore these. It takes a couple of days to wear in and get used to the toe piece but after that - perfection. They are a lovely help to my posture and alleviate back pain from the super flat flip-flops and other summer sandals. The silver is a perfect color. I can even get away with wearing these to the office on casual Friday as the silver makes them a touch more dressy. They lend a little finesse and polish to any cute summer outfit or just shorts and a t-shirt. I've lived in these every day since purchased. Will buy more Birks!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: FAKE. FAKE AS FAKE CAN BE. First off, they don't even feel like real Birkenstock, second, there is glue all over the insides and they're coming apart, third, the buckle feels like some kind of cheap aluminum. They're going back. I'm so disappointed. Do your research......... I found several articles about fake Birkenstock shoes being sold through third party vendors on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpeachjamie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty certain these are knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: Pretty certain the pair I received were fakes; they just looked and felt cheap and the white straps looked very shiny/cheap. I decided to go try them on in a store, and sure enough, the same shoe looked and felt completely different: well made, not cheap at all. Beware counterfeit items!
customer_reviews.author: VintageGal

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was good enough to make good on my pair
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! I bought 2 pairs of these form Friendly's. They are knock offs. My pair split at the toe within a few months and my sister's are destroyed. I have a real pair and after a year of use, they still look new. Amazon was good enough to make good on my pair. I am getting ready to call them regarding my sister's shoes. Make sure you buy from a certified dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Maven

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So the metal pair on the thong left a rust mark on my feet after the first wear-no joke, that has yet to come off after several showers. I own several other pair of Birkenstock gizeh and have never had this problem, perhaps because they are rubber instead of whatever cheap metal was used this pair. Shoe is cute, fits great but rust residue is ridiculous for a shoe I paid almost $100 for. Very very disappointed. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs big
customer_reviews.text: Took me a couple tries to get the right size. Normally I wear a women's US 8 in all sneakers and boots. Very rarely do I wear a 7.5 if the shoe runs big. I originally ordered 1 size down, knowing that this brand runs big. It was still too big. Ultimately ended up buying the 37 (US size 6-6.5) and that fit my foot perfectly like a bug in a rug. It's a great shoe I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: These are FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact same size and color as my prior pair that I wore through after many years of love. I immediately suspected these were fake, quickly substantiated by the many reviews I should have checked before purchasing. The footbed was too hard even for un-broken-in Birkenstocks, and the glue all around the cork looks cheap and obvious and was peeling in some places. Definitely returning these fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: I thought these sandals were great when I started wearing them
customer_reviews.text: I thought these sandals were great when I started wearing them, but after only 4 months, the cork had cracked at the metatarsals and started crumbling at the heel. I believe that they are counterfeit Birkies, since the real deal ones will last years and years. Of course, by the time they were falling apart, it was too late to send them back. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: NCB

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE WHAT YOU GET! Might be used
customer_reviews.text: I own several Birkenstock sandals and this is the first time I receive a pair with foot prints inside them. The box arrived completely crushed and so were the sandals. Scratched all over and the leather all bent. You can clearly see heel prints and toe prints inside the sandal. Also the cork had damage on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Splitting cork = splitting headache
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the t-strap style that causes the cork to split near my big toe's knuckle or its if just Birks in general. This is the second pair of Gizeh that split one month after wearing. I don't wear them every single day but the cork always splits in the same area. I've owned other styles of Birks and there hasn't been any issue. I'm sure I could buy cork glue but why spend mucho dinero on stylish sandals only to have to buy an additional product to fix them? I love the comfort of Birks but the ugly splitting is well, ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Faelizzy

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are literally the most uncomfortable things I've ever worn. I thought maybe I had to break them in a bit so I suffered for a few days and wore them constantly. By the end of day 2 my poor feet were in so much pain and I had a giant blister on my toe. Wish I'd kept the packaging so I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing, looks and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed, I wanted a size 39 but because they force you to choose US size I ordered 8-8.5 which was the right size according to the sizing chart. But instead I received a size 40 which are way too big. This was meant to be a gift for someone overseas so returning and replacing is impossible. I think is really unreasonable they don’t show you the correct, the real European size. I also have my doubts this is a counterfeit product. It looks and feel cheap. Would not recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.author: NiaNia

customer_reviews.title: Beware of listed sizes
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this a 2 rating because of the seller and listing. The item is listed in US sizes but made in Euro sizes so listing is confusing. The item is perfect except I have ordered 3 different sizes and they keep sending me a size 38 when I need a 39. I have tried contacting both Amazon and Orva stores to get the correct size with no help, they both say to return the incorrect size and order the correct size which I have tried and it doesn't get me the size I need. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Becky L.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few pairs of Birkenstocks, not going to lie, I was apprehensive to purchase these from Amazon, with all the fake reviews, you can't trust them like you used to, but in the back of my head, I knew I could return them if they were fake. Luckily, they are very real. I'm happy with my purchase, I'm happy with the speed of which they arrived. They fit and feel like they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Hikemylife

customer_reviews.title: I've learned the trick...order in Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I love Birkenstocks, and have several pair, but I've always wished they looked a little daintier on my feet. My feet are medium-wide, and I never would think to buy Narrow in any shoes. But, I was at Nordstrom Rack and tried a pair on...all they had was Narrow. They looked GREAT! So much cuter. So, now, I order all Birkenstocks in Narrow, and they're perfect. Size 9, so I order a 40N.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Big/ Ruined my joints
customer_reviews.text: I have had Birks in the past, so ordered what I had last time. I am usually a normal size 10 but these were a little big- even on the tightest hole. After two months of wear, my joints, back, knees, hips all hurt so bad I had trouble sleeping or even climbing stairs. Changed my sandals and am back to normal. Very strange in comparison to pairs I have owned in the past.
customer_reviews.author: littleboysblue

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious with any kind of patent leather fake or real😯
customer_reviews.text: I would have given five stars but I was a little disappointed when I had to change the strap to tighten it the metal brackets left marks on the shiny white patent leather. I cannot get them off so now I feel like they look dirty😠 I guess this is a gamble you take with any type of patent leather whether it's black or white it always shows scuffs or marks. Other than that they're one of my favorite style of sandals and they are super comfortable to wear all day long and my feet don't hurt
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!  True to size and color.
customer_reviews.text: I could not love these shoes more. The color and size are exactly as expected. Definitely need to be broken in before wearing them for an entire day, as they are stiff at first. This is the 3rd pair of Birkenstocks that I currently own. Very happy with my purchase. I will say, I was nervous about the color. I googled the colors and viewed all the different images online. Super helpful and got a better idea of what to expect. The Tobacco brown is true to color and cute. I like the more distressed leather look, rather than one solid plastic looking color. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable- sadly had to return
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad I had to return these. The foot bed is fine-typical Birk-but the thick, hard plastic thing that goes in between the toe is sheer hell for me. I gave it a try for a week and by that time, I was in tears! I had a horrible blister in between toes on one foot. With that level of pain, it just wasn’t worth it to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: amazon123

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: After going through my summer shoes a few weeks ago, I decided to finally toss my two old trusty pairs of Birkenstocks due to how worn they were. It’s been maybe 10 years since I bought my last pair and I was excited to buy these with the new colors and materials. I made two mistakes right away: I forgot that these need a small break in period and that I’d have to build up a little callous between my toes for the thongs. Regardless, this was a fantastic purchase at a great price and I’m looking forward to wearing these daily very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Ec-lec-tic

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a Birkenstock Sandals. I have noticed they run about 1/2 to 1 size larger . I wear a 9 in tennis shoes and 7.5 or 8 in Vionic/ Orthaheels this Birkenstock Sandals always a 8 Color is very pretty. I have a very high arch and these are great for that also. Yes the price can be high but these last for years and your definitely getting your moneys worth. They are right you get what you pay for. Birkenstock is known for durability and great on your feet !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be returning these as I do not feel they are authentic. They arrived in a Birkenstock box but the name, size and picture of the item does not appear on the end, as it should. These fakes are decent fakes as all of the print is where it should be, however the actual footbed is different from that of a true Birkenstock. Different material. Different feel and the sizing is different. A real Birk is a little loose on me and these are almost snug. I thought I'd take a chance since they were so inexpensive but I would prefer the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not too pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I LOVE Birkenstock..... BUT, this style was not what i expected. First the color was not exactly what was shown in the picture. The picture showed a flat black color but when it arrived in the mail they were a shiny black color. And when you slide your foot in and walk around in them the middle toe piece rubs uncomfortably on my toe. Not pleased. Won’t buy again. I’ll stick with the Birkenstock Mayari style sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Julius 3

customer_reviews.title: Not fake!! I thought for sure these would be fakes. I love all my birks. Will be keeping them!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived today, and I fully expected to return them. I thought for sure they were gonna be fake. They arrived in the proper box. And in excellent condition. And I compared them to my other birks that I ought direct from them. And they looked legitimate. They would have to go through alot to make them that exact. Why bother? And the fir was perfect . And the comfort is true to birks. Firm at first. Not returning these especially for 49.00 dollars!! Don't know about others but these are great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: Order one size down! I normally wear a 6 to 6.5, or a 36 in European sizing, but I had to order a 35. I was really worried about the break-in time because my feet are really sensitive to irritations and I'm really picky about comfortable shoes. However I never got a blister and I broke them in after a few days. They start out very stiff though. I can also see how certain foot shapes might rub against the center plastic post by the large toe.
customer_reviews.author: F.O.

customer_reviews.title: Fakes !?
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure these are fake. I get a blister on the inside of my second toe in due to the super hard cheap plastic that runs up against it. I’ve talked to a few other ppl who’ve bought the same birks from the actual store and this doesn’t seem to be a problem. LAME!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe! As a hairdresser in one of the hottest states there is, wearing sandals to work becomes a must through June-August just to stay cool. But usually my feet are killing me by the end of the day from the lack of support for my feet. I opted to buy these this summer in hopes they would help my poor feet, and they most definitely did. Great support, don't slip and slide like my other sandals, color looks great. 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So great for narrow feet!!! <—-and I can’t emphasize that enough!! I always thought of Birkenstocks as being a wide sandal, and have never tried them before. I was delighted when I saw they offer several narrow styles, but I was still skeptical...because I am someone who can try on every pair of cute shoes/sandals/boots in the store and have every. single. pair be too wide. These are SUPER comfortable too! When they were brand new, I wore them walking all around Boston on our “baby moon” while 28 weeks pregnant and my feet felt great. I’ve also worn them walking all day at Disney World. They’ve become my go-to sandal every day in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: HURTS BETWEEN THE TOES
customer_reviews.text: I love Birkenstock sandals, they are very comfortable and were recommended for my plantar fasciitis. These however, the thong hurt between my toes. I can only wear a very short time before it's too painful. Love the look, just too uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Iris V.

customer_reviews.title: Check fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black patent/pink sole in a size 37 for my size 7/7.5 feet and they fit perfectly. I have short toes and there isn't much extra room in the toe pad. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Makes noises when walking....
customer_reviews.text: Makes a weird “farting” noise when walking, a bit stiff but I’m hopeful they’ll adhere to my foot shape soon.
customer_reviews.author: Book-junkie12

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these, as they are my favorite shoe and I wear them all the time. I can't say enough wonderful things about Birks, and this particular thong sandal is the best! They are cute and comfortable. I have a bit of plantar fasciitis and these give me the arch support I need. I love how they mold to my feet... they become the perfect fit in a short period of time!
customer_reviews.author: Reggae Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to this shoe. The strap made my feet itch terribly. Also, the strap is really uncomfortable between the toes. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Cavish

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black patent from seller "AreaTrend". The shoes are not as pictured. Instead of the pink "button" between the toes and the pink sole, these have a black button and a black sole. I'm not happy about this, although I am considering keeping them as I do like the shoes. Buyer beware however: they are NOT as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I wanted and FAST SHIPPING!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for the Gizeh’s in Dress Blue (patent) for a while now .. every time i find them, they’re sold out! As soon as I found them here, I took a chance and ordered them and they’re absolutely perfect!! I compared them side by side with my other blue patent Birk’s (Arizona style) and they’re exactly the same .. I was worried these might be knockoffs but I believe these are the real deal .. also, they came in the original box .. They’re perfect and I couldn’t be happier!! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: High arch support, look great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size larger (European size) than I normally wear. They fit well. The footbed has a lot of arch support. They feel a bit stiff out of the box but that is expected with Birkenstock. The thing between the toes is also quite stiff but should soften after a few days wear. I will update. I ordered the black patent and I love how they look. For a Birkenstock, it's dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I was hesitant to purchase these because I'm cheap when it comes to my shoes. However, I decided to take a chance and I am SO glad I did. I LOVE these. They did take a couple of days to break in, but I used one of those no-rub sticks for your shoes and that helped. I also walk far in these - a mile at a time for my commute, so it could have been the fact that breaking them in was like baptism by fire. I wear a pretty normal size 10 and bought these in 41 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Couterfit
customer_reviews.text: These are not real berks be warned! Everything thing seems correct where the wording is on the inside strap is not cut out and filled with black as a pair of real shoes would be. The stamp on the sole of the shoe also did not have numbers
customer_reviews.author: AM Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Something felt different...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals didn't fit as well as. For some reason, the foot bed was too shallow and unlike other ones I purchased. It's strange. It also came in an unmarked box. I got the silver ones and brown ones, and only the silver ones were shallow. I'm being purposely vague in some aspects because my original post was not approved, which is odd.
customer_reviews.author: happy kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good sandal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sandal but the sizing options are off. I typically wear a size 9.5 or 10 and to err on the side of caution I ordered the 10 to 10.5. Euro sizes I'm a 39 and I received a 41. Would have been much easier to order in euro sizes. Hopefully they'll still form to my feet over time as Birkenstocks are known to do, even with them being 2 sizes too big.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure these are authentic
customer_reviews.text: After my return window closed they started to split and peel. I’ve never seen that with real Birkenstock’s purchased locally from authorized deals. They looked really worn within a few months and started coming apart shortly after. They’re comfortable but they look awful and will have to be glued back together. Not worth the few dollars I saved by getting them here.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe and the look but I have had these shoes less the two months and the side has peeled off. I expected they would be more durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Birkenstocks and tried these on and could tell immediately that they are fake. These were also way too big. These 39's are much larger than the other pair of the same shoes that I have in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No !
customer_reviews.text: Love the color ! However after two months of light wear , the sides are cracking ! Not worth the money. Very disappointed in the quality of this product ! After much research only buy through the Birkenstock website or not guaranteed! So disappointed! They were not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I so badly wanted to like these! I tried two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I so badly wanted to like these! I tried two different sizes, but the ridges just wouldn't fit in the right place under my toes. It it was super painful to walkwith those ridges in the wrong place for my foot! I even tried them on in stores. The store pair felt better, but cost more. I loved the color and quality, but ended up not keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stamets

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous black!
customer_reviews.text: These are Beautiful Gizehs, I could not believe the cool black/iridescent style was in my size at a great end of summer price! True Birkenstock’s, made in Germany. So comfy, as are all true Birks. I had to say goodbye to a pair that were 5 years old and quite worn. These are a wonderful replacement. I may buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: These are fake.
customer_reviews.text: These are counterfeit. And I sent for one size and received another. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: gc14

customer_reviews.title: Stylish up to date look!
customer_reviews.text: Typically I’m not a fan of the Birkenstock look. Dealing with a bout of plantar fasciitis forced me to consider Birkenstock’s. I was pleasantly surprised to see the variety of styles-a huge improvement from the 1970’s look I disliked. I ordered this sandal and LOVE them. So comfortable! And what a relief for my pain. I say order Birkenstock’s you will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Provencio

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without them!!❤️
customer_reviews.text: These sandals help my back pain! I have several pairs and put them on the minute I get out of bed. They are strong, not squishy, my foot does not slide. The arch support is what helps me the most. I live in the northeast but have managed to wear them all year long even on Christmas Eve to church when there wasn't much snow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fien

customer_reviews.title: LUVMYBIRKIS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! YOU REALLY CANT GO WRONG WITH BIRKIS!! THEY SUPPORT YOUR FOOT LIKE NO OTHER SHOE! HELPS ME SO IMMENSELY WITH MY PLANTAR FASCIITIS. HAS EVEN SAVED ME HUNDREDS OF TIMES FROM STUBBING MY TOE!! THATS JUST ICING IN THE CAKE! THE FIT IS ALWAYS SPOT ON. ONLY COMPLAINT WAS CORAL COLOR WAS CLOSER TO ORANGE CREAM....EXPECTED A SLIGHTLY PINKER HUE.
customer_reviews.author: arleene zavala

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but ouch!  Buyer beware if you need to send them back!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these and it’s only because of the plastic in between my toes. It gave me horrible blisters and swelling. I think they may have been a little big for me, but it depends on how you like them to fit. Really cute! I have to send them back. I will try a pair without the toe thing. So be aware if you decide to buy because I had to pay to send them back. That’s not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE IF THESE ARE THE REAL DEAL?
customer_reviews.text: NOT SURE THESE ARE THE REAL DEAL...THE POST BETWEEN THE TOE IS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE WHEN WALKING 10 STEPS! TRIED ON A FRIENDS AND THAT ARE THE SAME EXACT SAME SIZE (39) THEY WERE COMPLETELY COMFY! I AM SENDING THESE BACK TODAY!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. First of all, they do not feel or look like real Birkenstocks. If I am going to pay $75, I am going to get the real thing. Even though I ordered my size, they were too big and just not what I was looking for. Ended up buying some $20 off brand sandals from Target and was way happier. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beekayohh

customer_reviews.title: Probably ok but order was incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened—ordered EU 38 (7 narrow) and received EU 40. Alas too big. Checked my order and definitely I selected 7 narrow. Darn. Sent back. At least return is easy. Looked at trying to order anew but price higher now. Darn again!
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time hopping on the Birkenstock Train, and I'm loving them! The metallic mermaid straps are to die for! I have wide feet and usually wear an 8.5W so I ordered the size 8, and the fit is pretty good. It took me a few hours only to break them in and they're super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Late night shopper

customer_reviews.title: Gizeh Devotee
customer_reviews.text: The first pair took me a day or two to get used to, the toe piece was a little different at first. 8 years later and four pairs later, I still love them tons. Finally got a fancier pair. So cute! Rose gold buckle and creme-pinkish birkoflor. I wear 35 in Birks US size 6, love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: They are as described. After I received them, ...
customer_reviews.text: They are as described. After I received them, I went to REI to compare them with exact ones they sold there to make sure they were authentic. Yes. Mine definitely are. The thing near the toes is a bit uncomfortable but I think that's just a personal preference. I wish they were leather but they are not. The brand is making their latest styles with synthetic leather-like material. I'm wearing a size 42. The pictures are after a month or so of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit, expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall product quality and design was very good, and very nice looking. But the fitting was not great, and did not have very good arch support. Also the ridges under and between the fingers did not feel well and kept feeling awkward while walking. Overall, we expected more for that brand and price. So we returned it. And basically got 2 pairs for that price and both of them are better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Birkenstock sandals. Love the red! My feet look great and my legs feel great. They ran a half size larger than the Joseph Seibel sizing I based my purchase on.
customer_reviews.author: coolpoodle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great shoe! I was worried about being able to break them in after seeing many reviews about them being hard on your feet. I wore them twice for a few hours and after that they were extremely comfortable. Great quality. I ordered an 8/8.5 and wear and they’re perfect. Definitely true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Whiteley

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cracking cork
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn “birks” for decades and have appreciated them for their long lasting and comfort. I don’t know what happened to these ones but they have a crack from the top to bottom of the cork!!! I’ve worn these new shoes a handful of times before they cracked and was hesitant to write this. These shoes cost a pretty penny and once upon a time I thought they were worth it because they lasted a long time. Has the company compromised it’s quality?
customer_reviews.author: Happy Day🌈

customer_reviews.title: Birk babe
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Wish i would have gotten a 39 for my 8.5-9 feet.i got the 40. Too late now though. Even though they were big I wore them everyday since I got them. I have tons of Sandals and these became the only ones I wore. Major break in time needed that I wasn't prepared for . Didn't hurt, but took a week or two to feel less stiff. I can walk miles in these with zero foot pain. They don't FLOP on the back of the foot and they look stylish for my mom look. Lols
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Palmer Meekins

customer_reviews.title: Im a huge Birk fan but this pair was off
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes about a year ago. They still arent as comfy as my other Birks. I feel like the cut is off or the leather is different. One shoe still bothers my second toe which has never happened with any of my other Birks (which were bought in store). The strap is on the last setting yet I need more space (give). Its weird. Either the quality Birkenstock has degraded or I got fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Nurse

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely high arch and sometimes it can be a challenge to find shoes that are completely comfortable. These sandals are now my favorite! They feel so good and are perfect for long shopping trips. Will purchase again in a different color. They are worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the House

customer_reviews.title: Fake Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many pairs of this Birkenstock style. When these arrived in the mail, I knew something was off as soon as I opened the box. They were packaged in a plastic bag rather than a shoebox. When I tried them in, I could tell ASAP they were a fake. They run much more narrow than that real Birks, and rather than cork, the footbed was plastic made to look like cork. The straps were also fake leather lined with felt.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Birko-Flor, go with the leather!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about these shoes except for the Birko-Flor straps. I got the Toffee color which was beautiful at first but began to discolor after just a few wears. A year later, the straps are stiff, warped, and cracking in a few places. The color is ruined. I went with the Birko-Flor for the price, and also because I thought theyʻd be easier to care for. I really wish I had ordered the leather.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE don’t waste your money like I did
customer_reviews.text: Completely FAKE!!! PLEASE don’t waste your money like I did!!! Falling apart, glue visible everywhere, no part of them was leather (upper or lower) and stiff as a board even after wearing! Garbage! Please beware!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are not .....
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what happened with these shoes. I have been a Birk wearer for many decades and these feel like I have boards under my feet. I love the color and have another pair of the exact same style that I love. Thinking I just needed to break them in however it doesn't seem to be happening. Hopefully one day they will but they still seem very different to any Birk I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hallmark

customer_reviews.title: True Birk
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on this particular pair of lovelies for a year and they were on sale on Amazon for $65! couldnt pass it up even though it is starting to snow. True to the Birkenstock brand, if you know your birk size, then you dont have to worry about the fit.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: The most uncomfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I was told once they were broken in they were very comfortable. This was the first time that I had purchased this brand of shoes. I have tried so many times to wear them, and they still hurt my feet. The bottom sole of one shoe seems different than the other. I think they are defective and I should have returned them. They are so painful to wear. I am really disappointed with the fact that I cannot wear them, and they were pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: Used (like new)
customer_reviews.text: Very excited for my 1st pair of Birkenstock’s! After wearing them for the 1st time my medial and lateral arches were tender. I have wide feed and heard they take a little getting used to and breaking in. Overall extremely sturdy and great quality other then a few marks which I guess classified them as “used” condition.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, but make sure to tighten the strap!
customer_reviews.text: These are great although I almost returned them. I first tried them on without adjusting the strap. I walked around in them with the strap loose and my foot drifted in the footbed making these very uncomfortable to walk in, especially between my toes. I almost returned them but hung onto them for a few more days and tried them in again, this time adjusting the strap. What a difference this made. It keeps your foot in place and these have immediately become my go-to sandals this summer. Im so happy I tried these a second time with the adjustment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Northwoods Hills

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found the Perfect Birken!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these Birkenstock's, especially the color! I don't know how to express how much she loves the Antique color. It has been so hard to find these in narrow until I found them here. We say its somewhat large, we recommend ordering these in a half size down from the normal shoe size. She wears an 8 and I ordered the 38 N. Perfect Fit! Doesn't have the bulky appearance as the regular Birkenstock's do.
customer_reviews.author: AC412

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I swore I would never wear Birkenstocks. The great metallic snake print got me! I have thin, bony, narrow feet that blister in almost every shoe I wear. These feel great and fit great! Love them! The shoebox arrived completely destroyed. Shoes were not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: SNAXX

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size shipped
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 7/7.5 (38) and received a 9 (40). Way too big and not what I ordered. Box has seen a lot of wear, and there are a lot of stickers over the original information. The shoes themselves look authentic though. As usual, too good to be true! Returning :(
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and side support strap ripped in just over a month, beware of no warranty on leather sandals that are priced to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: This sandal is okay
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred a different style of sandals, but the cost to return or exchange was astronomical.
customer_reviews.author: theresa cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Very Dressy Sandal
customer_reviews.text: The dress blue Birkenstocks are awesome! I wear a size 8 shoe and the 37M EU fit perfectly. I have wide feet but it does not seem to impact the size. I have 12 pair of Birkenstocks and they all fit the same in a size 37M EU for size 8 shoe. Thought I would mention this as I have read many reviews of people who are unsure of the shoe size versus the EU size. Hope this can help someone!
customer_reviews.author: cher

customer_reviews.title: Attention is the details
customer_reviews.text: Typically I love Birkenstock gizehs. I have a pair that I love so much they are starting to show wear after 3 yrs. I ordered another pair. Unfortunately they arrived in male 9 instead of female 9. I am returning. I double checked my order and I ordered correctly.
customer_reviews.author: theresa eppstein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: At first the pair we ordered was too big. But thanks to Amazon's return policy, we were able to reorder another pair one size smaller. And the new pair fits like a glove so to speak. And like other Birkenstock sandals, the quality is there as usual!
customer_reviews.author: mmsumulong

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this exact style Birkenstock (gizeh in black patent) nearly every year for the past 7 years and this pair wasn’t like any of my others. The sizing was significantly smaller (at least a full size) and more narrow, the shoe was noticeably lighter in weight, and the overall quality and look was just subpar for comparison. I honestly am not sure that these are authentic or perhaps they are from an outlet. I am returning
customer_reviews.author: Candice S.

customer_reviews.title: Feel and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fit just like birks are supposed to...they are very stiff...just like NEW birks are supposed to be. There is a break in period for sure but that’s normal. The blue color is more of a distressed silver. Very cute and will go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Customer#5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I went on a 3 day trip & only took these scandals. They looked great with my dress, jeans and palazzo pants! I also did a lot of walking and no aches or blisters! So comfortable, I want another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Real Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Thong part is very wide and hurts toes.
customer_reviews.text: The thong hurts my toe crotch within minutes of walking. I walked to my mailbox and back in pain 😭
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Have to pay to return them!
customer_reviews.text: These run big and had to return them. Between Amazon and the third party whom I bought them from, I had to pay to return them. This is ridiculous! Read the fine print before you order anything on Amazon. Glad Jeff Bezos is sitting fat and happy on my dime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instep is very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the Gizeh style Birkenstock and have many older pairs. However, this (medium width) pair is narrow and cuts into my instep. Regrettably, these will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Drum Prof

customer_reviews.title: This strap is very uncomfortable in between your toes!
customer_reviews.text: The strap in the middle of the first and second toe is VERY uncomfortable. The length is too long.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting ones for a while. I finally decided on this one. I have only had them for 2 days a little breaking in, so far so good. Usually I wear size 10 or 9.5 depending on the width of the shoe. I got the 9/9.5 they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sony Pi

customer_reviews.title: It molded my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have six pairs of Birkenstock’s sandals. I always have a pair for me to wear inside the house because I have low arches and I needed the support to walk around. Since I started wearing them, my back problems improved so much. I love them and I will keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pair of the Birkenstock Gizeh shoes over the years and I love them! Until now I have required a narrow footbed, however my foot has widened since pregnancy and I ordered a regular this time and they fit wonderfully. Birkenstocks do take some time to wear in and are not very comfortable at first, however give them time. As they mold to your foot and break in, they will become the most comfortable shoe you have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6 and this was about a half inch too large. I have slightly wide feet and It fit perfect on the sides. I do wish the was a little more traction on the bottom for safety. I don't recommend wearing these for anything other than casual strolls at a slow pace with little elevation changes. It's easy to trip with these if you don't completely pick up your feet. So pick them up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Akeens

customer_reviews.title: An orthotic shoe that doesn't look like an orthotic shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritic toes and plantar fasciitis. I needed a stiff-soled shoe with a deep heel cup and in a narrow width. Trying to find this combination in a flip-flop for summer was crazy difficult. Then I found this one and it's perfect! My feet feel comfortably supported in a cute sandal and my toes are free to wiggle! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stickney

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite!! I'm a size 7-7.5 with narrow feet, and I can adjust the size 37 to fit perfectly. My only complaint is after a couple of years, the cork starts to break down at the crease under the ball of the foot, but at that point they are just about ready to be retired anyways since I wear them so often during the warmer months. Mine have been well-loved and still look great, but it will be time for a replacement soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: AmyJ

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these white ones after I tried my daughters brown pair. I was Expecting to get a soft and comfortable t-strap. These are very hard, non pliable and uncomfortable. They feel like plastic. Is there another Giseh that is comfortable ???
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: Love this more less clunky version  of these classic and comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and supportive with a more streamlined look than original style. The silver goes with everything and is so easy and comfortable. I’ve had heel and arch issues in the past and since wearing these I have had not flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: V. Quartaro

customer_reviews.title: Great for bunions!
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions that I'm normally self-conscious about, but these shoes not only look good, but feel really good on my feet. I love how it hugs the foot so there's no chafing or movent. Plus the divider part between the big toe and the second toe really separates them, which I think is very healthy for people with bunions.
customer_reviews.author: FrancisE

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This she was a little bit more narrow than I expected but it is amazing what you actually get with this company. It’s wonderful support it’s great quality and there’s just nothing that compares to a Birkenstock.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hobbs

product_meta.title: BIRKENSTOCK Women's Gizeh Thong Sandal
product_meta.description:
The classic birkenstock toe-post style sandal, with birkoflor uppers, cork latex footbed, adjustable strap and shock absorbing eva sole.

This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: Thong sandal featuring rubber toe post with logoed medallion and adjustable vamp strap with buckle closure
